MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH12 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Carrick Knowe Drive and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 09:40am. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:24am on the 13th of October 2020
